strings: <voice_0x010009D5><se_low>*: Ah! You found it! Let's see!

<voice_0x010009D6><se_low>*: Yep, this is the one!
This is definitely my tool bag.
<voice_0x010009D7><se_low>*: Thanks! I suppose I'd better give you that reward I promised...
<voice_0x010009D9><se_low>*: That little mouse you've got there is no normal mouse!
<voice_0x010009DA><se_low>*: It's your pet, is it? Right...
<voice_0x010009DB><se_low>*: Here. Have this cheese as your reward.
<Cap><hero> places eight pieces of plain cheese in the bag.
<voice_0x010009DC><se_low>*: It may just be plain old cheese, but that mouse of yours is sure to like it.
<voice_0x010009DD><se_low>*: And I could be wrong, but try givin' it some next time you've got yourself into a fight with some monsters...
<voice_0x010009DE><se_low>*: You never know what might happen!
<voice_0x010009DF><se_low>*: Anyway, that's enough noise out of me. Thanks again for bringin' my bag back.
